comment: Acy-carrier protein is acp domain of the enzyme itself. mycocerosyl-[acp]-forming (ec 2.3.1.111, see R11450) mycolipanoyl-[acp]-forming (ec 2.3.1.252, see R11451)
definition: Acyl-CoA + n Methylmalonyl-CoA + 2n NADPH + 2n H+ + Acyl-carrier protein <=> Multi-methyl-branched acyl-[acp] + (n+1) CoA + n CO2 + 2n NADP+ + n H2O
name: acyl-CoA:methylmalonyl-CoA C-acyltransferase (decarboxylating, oxoacyl- and enoyl-reducing)
